name: Month End Summary Report
query:
select
i.item_code as "Item code:Link/Item:200" ,
i.item_name as "Item Name::300",
i.total_weight as "Total Weight::100",
i.total_net_weight as "Actual Weight::100",
COALESCE(((i.total_net_weight*100)/(i.total_weight))-(100),0) as "Over/Under(IN%%)::100",
CASE when i.total_net_weight > i.total_weight and i.total_weight !=0 THEN "Over weight"
    when i.total_net_weight < i.total_weight and i.total_weight !=0 THEN "Under weight"
    when i.total_weight = 0 THEN "Update weight per unit in item master to get the result"
END as "Over/Under::300"
from `tabSales Invoice` si join `tabSales Invoice Item` i
where si.name=i.parent
group by i.item_code
order by COALESCE(((i.total_net_weight*100)/(i.total_weight))-(100),0) asc;
